NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Miscellaneous/Agenda Items for EC Meetings/2021 
Policy Circular No. 18.67/2021, Dated 23rd March, 2021 
[As per approval given by Chairman] 
Sub: Submission of Agenda Items for EC Meetings 
Refer Circular dated 10.10.2019 directing thereby to ensure that the EC Agenda 
Item is very brief and it should not be bulky. EC also directed that the concerned CGM 
may carry the required supporting documents which could be shown to EC, if asked for 
in the meeting. 
2. Despite above instructions, bulky Agenda Items are still coming before EC. EC 
has taken serious objection to such bulky items. The concerned Division shall bring al 
important issues involved to the notice of EC in brief, rather than putting up bulky 
Agenda Items. EC instructed all concerned divisions once again to scrupulously comply 
with above instructions in future. 
3. The Agenda Items can be loaded for consideration of EC till the evening of one 
day before EC meeting, but no Agenda Item shall be permitted to be loaded on the day 
of EC meeting or tabled, unless Chairman formally approves, before the start of EC 
meeting, for loading/ tabling of any item. 
4. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.

Sub: Submission of Agenda Items for EC meetings reg. 
The Executive Committee in its 401st Meeting held on 20.09.2019 vide 
Agenda Item No. 401.12 has directed to issue instructions to ensure back to back 
photocopy of EC agenda items and also not to make agenda items bulky. EC also 
directed that the concerned CGM may carry the required supporting documents 
which could be shown to EC, if asked for, in the meeting. 
Accordingly, all concerned officers are requested to follow the above 
directions scrupulously and submit the Agenda items as per details given below: 2. 
Original Agenda in the prescribed approved format (duly signed in all 
pages, numbered and containing project sanction code)
